Hi everyone!! Marcaria.com is seeking candidates for the position of " Sales & Customer Service Representative ".
Candidates must be Business-oriented professionals, with experience in administration and/or international business. Bachelor degree is a must.
Candidates must be fluent in English, and have intermediate Spanish.
The selected candidate will be in charge of attending customers, maintaining accounts, supervising and managing the commercial relationship with International clients.
The work location of this job is in Las Condes (Santiago de Chile).
We offer competitive salary, benefits, stability and a great working environment.
If you are interested in the position " Sales & Customer Service Representative " please send your resume and salary expectations to Cecilia Gómez: cecilia.gomez@marcaria.com.

data.message:
2 DOUBLE BED ROOMS for RENT IN ÑUÑOA
$190,000 - Santiago de Chile

I am RENTING two DOUBLE BED ROOMS in a beautiful apartment between Irarrázabal and Ñuble metro stops, in the wonderful neighborhood of Ñuñoa.

The apartment block has all the facilities you need; BBQs (quinchos), swimming pool, gym, halls, all around a big, colourful garden.

About the rooms?
Each room has a double bed, a huge built-in wardrobe, bedside table with its own lamp, carpeted floor, a window with natural light, pillows, a trunk and a bin.

About the apartment?
The apartment has incredible views of all Santiago (12th floor) and it is located in front of a green park, perfect for jogging. The apartment has a big living room, a terrace with lots of plants and a grill, table&chairs to chill out and enjoy the views. The kitchen is giant and fully-equipped (I love cooking for people and I prepare the best cake of Santiago!), and the most of the electrical appliance are almost new. There is also a laundry room with a new washing machine, a clothes horse and an iron. There are two spacious bathrooms, both with bathtub, heater and hairdryer.

About me?
I am a working girl from Barcelona, I lived in France and Belgium, and almost four years ago I came to Chile. What I like the best is to travel and I try to do it almost every weekend with my car, so you are welcomed to join me! Besides traveling, I love doing sport; there is a park next to the apartment perfect for jogging, I practice Muay Thai in a gym nearby and I love trekking!!

I think it is super easy living with me and I have the good habit of laughing all the time hahaha =) If you want to invite people, of course you can, I am really sociable so I will enjoy meeting all of them!!

And last but not least, I have a bicycle so you can use it to go to your university, your job or whatever you want!

data.message:
Comparto Comoda Casa con piscina en Macul- Santiago
$290,000 - Macul

SHARE  ACCOMMODATION IN MACUL  $290.000 CLP per month

Teacher of English and her two daughters ,high school students, want to share their comfortable home with another woman. 

Room with private bathroom; Equipped with sigle bed of excellent quality, bed linen, towels, desk, closet, safe box (just acquired).

Services included: Water, gas, electricity; use of exclusive swimming pool; TV in Hall; WIFI; Washing machine; Clothes dryer ; Fully equipped kitchen; Room cleaning, linen change, towels and common areas once a week. 

We live with our pets; two cats and two dogs that live outside the house. We are very friendly and easy going and will be glad to help you in any way you may need.

Although it  is a residential area, the house  is well situated  literally steps from the metro Quilin, Mall Paseo Quilin,  supermarkets, and vegetable markets around; The airport is 30 mts from  home by car.

It will be a great pleasure for us to help you go around the city. 
We hope you have a great time in our country!

Please Share

data.message: Marcelo Mendezwei mira!

Buenos dias a todos,  

Estoy preguntando para una prácticas con una empresa durante doce semanas desde marzo para aprobar mi licencatura en direccion de comercio internacional en Francia. 

Soy un estudiante muy motivado que quiere ganar experiencia, y ampliar mis conocimientos en el sector del comercio internacional, importación, exportación, puede ser un estudio del mercado, marketing también.
     
Puedo ser una excelente adición a un equipo de empleados dedicados a causa de mi actitud positiva, mis habilidades de organización. 
     
Si alguien esta interesado por mi perfil, o si tienes contactos en este sector por favor, enviame un mesaje privado en Facebook o por email : diard.alexis@yahoo.fr así que podré enviar mi hoja de vida.

Muchas gracias
  
Alexis Diard.

2 DOUBLE BED ROOMS for RENT IN ÑUÑOA
$190,000 - Santiago de Chile

I am RENTING two DOUBLE BED ROOMS in a beautiful apartment between Irarrázabal and Ñuble metro stops, in the wonderful neighborhood of Ñuñoa.

The apartment block has all the facilities you need; BBQs (quinchos), swimming pool, gym, halls, all around a big, colourful garden.

About the rooms?
Each room has a double bed, a huge built-in wardrobe, bedside table with its own lamp, carpeted floor, a window with natural light, pillows, a trunk and a bin.

About the apartment?
The apartment has incredible views of all Santiago (12th floor) and it is located in front of a green park, perfect for jogging. The apartment has a big living room, a terrace with lots of plants and a grill, table&chairs to chill out and enjoy the views. The kitchen is giant and fully-equipped (I love cooking for people and I prepare the best cake of Santiago!), and the most of the electrical appliance are almost new. There is also a laundry room with a new washing machine, a clothes horse and an iron. There are two spacious bathrooms, both with bathtub, heater and hairdryer.

data.message:
Garmin Nuvicam GPS
$190,000 - Santiago, Chile

Hello everyone,

I am selling my Garmin Nuvicam GPS. Like new.

Still under warranty (acquired October 27/2015 for CLP 289 990, invoice available).

Sale price: CLP 190 000. Reason for selling: bought a new car with integrated GPS.

Main Features:

• Voice command.
• Embedded camera.
• Accessibility.
• Traffic Alerts.
• Real Directions.

Highlights vs smartphone’s GPS:

- Satellite network reliability vs cellular network
- Onboard camera filming all of your journeys (useful in case of dispute with another driver )

Maximum rating awarded by Digital Trends:
http://www.digitaltrends.com/gps-reviews/garmin-nuvicam-lmthd-review/

Double room available!
$275,250 - Santiago, Chile

Hello everyone! I am seeking a flatmate from the beginning of January for my apartment right in the heart of downtown Santiago, (on Monjitas, close to Plaza de Armas and Bellas Artes). Ideally another professional (I am currently working as an English teacher until next July), although I will consider all offers. Also a Spanish speaker would be preferable, so I can practice! I won't bore you with details of my various passions and inner workings of my soul; rest assured that I am wonderful and you should consider it a privilege to share the same oxygen. 

The room itself is a double with en suite bathroom facilities and great views of the city and surrounding mountains. Rent (including bills/utilities) is CLP$275,250. Message me for any further information, etc. 

Thanks!

urgente!! donacion de sangre!!
$1 - Urgencia Universidad Católica Marcoleta

Hola 
Tengo una amiga española que está enfermita. Esta semana le diagnosticaron leucemia. Se iba a ir ayer a España para tratarse pero la noche del viernes se puso muy grave y no pudo volar. Ahora está un la UPD. La tienen sedada. Esta grave pero estable. Esta noche viajan sus padres a Santiago.
Entonces quería pediros si por favor podéis donar sangre en el banco de la Catolica a nombre de Raquel Merino Fernández. La entrada está en la puerta frente a urgencias (Calle Marcoleta) y el horario es de 8 a 18 horas.
Al ser española no sé si conseguiremos difundir tanto la petición de donación por lo que si además de donar,podéis difundirlo vosotros también, os lo agradezco mucho.
Muchas gracias! Un abrazo

Rent my apartments,  in La Serena
$110

Ladies and Gents!!!. Rent my apartments,  in La Serena. Located in front of the beach, offers panoramic sea views, and features a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, a garden, a spa, and a fitness centre.There is also a tennis court on site/ baby football and a play room for children. Guests  can relax in the spa or exercise in the fitness centre. There is also a tennis court and a game room. Bicycle rentals are possible, and surf.
The apartments is fully furnished, and equipped with items such as satellite TV (in English and Spanish) and WIFI.  One of the bedrooms has a double bed, whilst the other bedroom has two single beds.  There are also 2 bathrooms, living room-dining room, fully equipped American style kitchen, refrigerator, microwave, wash basin, music centre, balcony with sea views, and private parking space.

4 persons= 110usd/night 

La Serena’s historical centre is 3 km away and the shopping centre is 2 km away. ‪LaSerena‬ Airport is 15 km away. Free private parking is possible on site.‬‬‬‬‬‬

data.message:
Hi all!  I'm in a real bind.  Does anyone here have  Microsoft Surface? The proprietary charger thing has me in a corner.  I'm ordering one online but it'll take so much time to get here and I need to have a functioning machine. It's a surface pro, first generation and requires a charger with the five round circles in line.  Those of you who have one know exactly what I'm talking about.  For the rest of you who don't... the Microsoft Surface is a tablet / laptop conversion. It's so freaking tough to get this issue resolved because it's not sold in South America. 

IF anyone in the Santiago area would like to help a brother out... there's beer and empanadas in it for you. Can I charge my machine with your charger? Maybe point out a solution for me. ☺

Thanks in advance!
Buy one on amazon. You will get it in one week. It works fine !!

data.message:
Hi friends & fellow travelers! I hope you’re all doing well! :)

At @LocalAventura we are dedicated to make authentic experiences in South America possible. Working alongside with locals, we’ve created a trusted online marketplace for people to explore and book amazing experiences.

Right now we’re offering 15% off your first day tour. Sign up today using promo code LocalAventura15 Or message me and I can help you plan your travels with our incredible guides! Here’s the link to our experiences in Argentina, check them out!

If you have friends or family coming to visit and want to make sure their trip is wonderful, we also offer 30 minutes of free travel advice, on everything from where to stay, what to eat, to what to skip out on! I’d be more than happy to talk to them - you can send them here:
data.name: LocalAventura - Book an authentic tour in Latin America

data.message:
CURSOS PARA LA INSERCIÓN LABORAL DE ESPAÑOLES EN CHILE 

Este miércoles 7 de 19:00 a 22:00 hrs, Grupo Norte imparte en el hotel Stanford (Metro Los Leones) el curso gratuito PAUTAS GENERALES PARA EL RETORNO A ESPAÑA, donde se hablará sobre los trámites que deben hacer las personas que volverse después de haber trabajando en Chile.

Además, para aquellos que acaban de llegar, están buscando un nuevo trabajo o quieren iniciar un emprendimiento, les puede interesar los siguientes cursos:

- Jueves 8: Migratoria y Sistema de Salud y AFP en Chile (19:00 a 22:00 hrs)
- Lunes 12: Introducción al Sistema de Tributación Chileno (19:00 a 22:00 hrs)
- Jueves 15: Análisis de Currículum Vitae parte 1 (19:00 a 22:00 hrs)
- Viernes 16: Análisis de Currículum Vitae parte 2 (19:00 a 22:00 hrs)
- Martes 20: Emprendimiento en Chile (19:00 a 22:00 hrs)
- Viernes 23: Legislación Laboral en Chile (19:00 a 22:00 hrs)
- Martes 27: Cómo trabajar en Chile Parte 1 (19:00 a 22:00 hrs)
- Miércoles 28: Cómo trabajar en Chile Parte 2 (19:00 a 22:00 hrs)

Para inscribirse solo es necesario escribir a seleccion.chile@gruponorte.cl ¡Son GRATUITOS!

¡Saludos!

Hello everyone,

I am selling my Garmin Nuvicam GPS. Like new.

Still under warranty (acquired October 27/2015 for CLP 289 990, invoice available).

Sale price: CLP 210 000. Reason for selling: bought a new car with integrated GPS.

Main Features:

 • Voice command.
 • Embedded camera.
        • Accessibility.
        • Traffic Alerts.
        • Real Directions.

Highlights vs smartphone’s GPS:

- Satellite network reliability vs cellular network
- Onboard camera filming all of your journeys (useful in case of dispute with another driver)

Maximum rating awarded by Digital Trends:

http://www.digitaltrends.com/gps-reviews/garmin-nuvicam-lmthd-review/

data.message:
Hi everyone! Marcaria.com is seeking candidates for the position of "Sales & Customer Service Representative".
Candidates must be Business-oriented professionals, with experience in administration and/or international business. Bachelor degree is a must. Candidates must be fluent in English, and have intermediate Spanish. 
The selected candidate will be in charge of attending customers, maintaining accounts, supervising and managing the commercial relationship with International clients.
The work location of this job is in Santiago de Chile (Las Condes). 
We offer competitive salary, benefits, stability and a great working environment.
If you are interested in the position "Sales & Customer Service Representative" please send your resume and salary expectations to Cecilia Gómez: cecilia.gomez@marcaria.com.

Hi!
I invite you to know more about the Chilean history, through this rock concert in Bellavista, Is about the history of "Lautaro" or "Leftraru" a very important mapuche warrior, in the XVI century... We wil playing this kind of mini "Opera Rock" and showing images and animations...
More information in the link! See you!

Arriendo Departamento en San Miguel
$360,000 - Santiago de Chile

Departamento Casi Nuevo en San Miguel,  ubicado a 5 minutos de Metros El Llano y San Miguel, cercano a supermercados, colegios, farmacias, centros médicos y otros servicios. El departamento cuenta con dos dormitorios, dos baños ( uno en suite), dos terrazas( una en habitación principal y otra en living comedor), logia con lavadero, amplia cocina tradicional, walk in closet ( en suite) alarma y home office. Además,  conserjería 24 horas, gimnasio, lavandería, sala de eventos, quincho, áreas verdes, piscina y espacio para  bicicletas.

IMPORTANTE: El valor del arriendo Incluye todas las lámparas, total 8 de: dormitorios, baños, cocina, pasillo y living. Además, de rieles dobles de cortinas en las dos piezas y el comedor, un gasto importante que no hará el arrendatario!!
Cuenta con estacionamiento propio y de visitas.
Valor Arriendo con estacionamiento: $360.000.-
Valor Arriendo sin estacionamiento $340.000.-
Gasto común $65.000.-

data.message:
location
$670 - Quatrième Arrondissement

Location pour le mois de Juillet et/ou Août (Septembre si besoin):

Studio au cœur du 11eme arrondissement (quartier Parmentier/Oberkampf) et de sa vie à toute allure : endroit idéal pour venir visiter Paris, faire la fête ou travailler.
Ce studio de 24 m2 habitable est très lumineux et dispose d’une chambre en mezzanine (un couchage est installé dans la mezzanine, mais non présent au moment de la photo) ! Studio calme (car donnant sur une cours intérieur) et bien équipé : meublé, wifi haut débit, coin cuisine aménagée, four combiné avec micro onde (donc possibilité de faire toute la cuisine possible, comme avec un vrai four), toaster, lave linge, réfrigérateur... 

L'appartement est entouré de plusieurs lignes donc il est très facile de se déplacer!
Ligne 3 : métro Rue Saint-Maur (à 2 minutes de l'appartement)
Ligne 2 : métro Ménilmontant (à 3 minutes de l’appartement)
Ligne 9 : métro Saint-Amboise (à 8 minutes de l’appartement
Ligne 5 et 9: métro Oberkampf (à 10 minutes de l'appartement)
Ligne 3-5-8-9-11: métro République (à 15/20 minutes de l'appartement)

Prix : 670€/mois TOUT compris (négociable si location pour 2 mois ou plus)

Se arrienda dormitorio en hermosa casa con gente joven y divertida a 5 minutos del metro Los Leones en barrio tranquilo: Pedro de Valdivia Norte. La habitación cuenta con closet, ventana y baño semi-privado. La casa cuenta con jardín, mesa de ping-pong, parrilla, home theatre, lavadora, lavavajillas, y cocina espaciosa. Más información por inbox.

We rent a bedroom in a beautiful house with young and fun people. The house is located 5 minutes from Los Leones metro station in a quiet neighbourhood. The bedroom has closet, window and a semi-private bathroom. The house has garden, ping-pong table, barbecue place, home theatre, washing machine, dish-washer and a big kitchen. More information through PM.

Hola soy Candy, tengo 25 años y soy española. Busco una habitación en un piso con estudiantes de todas las nacionalidades, un depa/casa grande o pequeño me da igual. En providencia o que no me quede muy lejos de mi Universidad, con un precio máximo de 200.000 pesos chilenos ^^ Voy a Santiago del 14 de julio a 30 de enero para hacer un intercambio en la Universidad Mayor. Busco gente con la que disfrutar de esta experiencia, jóvenes, que les guste viajar, la fiesta/carrete, y pasarlo bien. Hablo francés y estoy estudiando inglés. Un saludo :)

Hi I'm Candy, I have 25 years and I am Spanish (Malaga, Andalusia). I need a room in a flat with students of all nationalities, a department/home large or I dont care ^^ I'm going to Santiago from July 14 to January 30 to make an exchange at the Universidad Mayor. I want live whith young people to enjoy this experience, who like to travel, party, and fun. I speak French and I am studying English. I want to live in Providence, which is not too far from my university at a maximum price of 200,000 pesos. Bye :)
Tengo una habitación en arriendo cerca de estación de metro.

data.message: Hi, we are desperately looking for a dog transport box that is certified by the IATA so Air France will accept it on our flight from Santiago to Paris. Do you have any hint? Most boxes sold here in Chile do not meet the IATA Standards. Thank you!

Co-work office
$74,000 - Santiago, Chile

Come check out our co-work offices and find the place you've been looking for!

Hi, I owe an apartment in Barrio Bella Vista (very well located and w/ a beautiful view) that I currently rent by days thru Air BNB. However I'm going to be away from Chile for 3 months (form september to december) and as I won't be able to attend those guests as I should, maybe Air BNB won't work for me anymore. 
So I'm looking for other options like a company who manages short rentals as in my case for who else needs it or even someone who want to rent during these 3 months... So whatever you guys know, tips or recommendation or someone interested to rent is more than welcome. Thank you and hope you all have a great week.

data.message:
Good day everyone! :)

For our thesis at Tilburg University in The Netherlands, we are conducting a research on the factors that influence expats, and we need as many valuable opinions as possible. So we need YOUR help :)

Do you live and work in a country that is not your home country? Then I would like to hear your feelings and experiences!
Do you know any (other) expats? Please feel free to share this with them!

At this point in our research, we are mainly looking for those of you that have been 'sent' to a foreign country by their organization. We only need a few more respondents, so any voice counts! :)

The questionnaire will only take approximately 10 minutes of your time.
data.name: Expatriate Survey

One-on-one Spanish lessons to improve conversational skills. According to your own needs, the classes can be taken in a single session format, or in a scheduled program. Coffee Break included. For more info, leave me a message or call me at +56981206313.
